36  BLInterpolation::~BLInterpolation() {
37  while (mRepository.size() > 0) {
38  delete mRepository.front();
39  mRepository.pop();
40  }
41 
42  while (mBuffer.size() > 0) {
43  delete mBuffer.front();
44  mBuffer.pop_front();
45  }
46  if (mFilter != 0) {
47  delete mFilter;
48  }
49  }

51  BLInterpolation& BLInterpolation::operator=(const BLInterpolation& from) {
52  mChannels = from.mChannels;
53  mOutData = from.mOutData;
54  mInputRate = from.mInputRate;
55  mOutputRate = from.mOutputRate;
56  mOrder = from.mOrder;
57  mAlpha = from.mAlpha;
58  mFilter = 0;
59 
60  Init();
61 
62  return *this;
63  }

67  BLInterpolation& BLInterpolation::Input(SeqViewDouble& indata) {
68  Dmatrix* data_in = indata.GetData();
69 
70  if (mFirstData) {
71  mStartTime = indata.GetStart();
72  mSampling = indata.GetSampling();
73  mFirstData = false;
74  }
75 
76  SetData(*data_in, indata.GetScale());
77 
78  return *this;
79  }
80 
81  BLInterpolation& BLInterpolation::Output(SeqViewDouble& outdata) {
82  Dmatrix* data_out = outdata.GetData();
83  if ((data_out->size1() != mChannels) || (data_out->size2() != mOutData)) {
84  LogWarning("Resizing output data");
85  data_out->resize(mChannels, mOutData);
86  }
87 
88  unsigned int ret = GetData(*data_out);
89 
90  if (ret == 0) {
91  LogWarning("No resampled data available");
92  throw no_data_available("BLInterpolation::operator>>");
93  }
94 
95  outdata.SetStart(mStartTime);
96  outdata.SetSampling((mSampling * mInputRate) / mOutputRate);
97  outdata.SetScale(1.0);
98 
99  mStartTime += (ret * mSampling * mInputRate) / mOutputRate;
100 
101  return *this;
102 
103  }
104 
105  double BLInterpolation::GetStartTime() {
106  return mStartTime;
107  }
108 
109  unsigned int BLInterpolation::GetData(Dmatrix& output) {
110  if (resampled_available() < int(mOutData)) {
111  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "Failed: needed: %d Available: %ld", mOutData, resampled_available());
112  return 0;
113  }
114  if (output.size1() != mChannels) {
115  LogSevere("Bad number of channels");
116  throw bad_matrix_size("BLInterpolation::GetData");
117  }
118  if (output.size2() != mOutData) {
119  LogSevere("Bad number of data");
120  throw bad_matrix_size("BLInterpolation::GetData");
121  }
122 
123  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "Success: needed: %d Available: %ld", mOutData, resampled_available());
124 
125  for (long int i = 0; i<int(mOutData); i++) {
126 
127  long int filter_bottom = mFilterCenter - mFilter->size() + 1;
128  long int filter_top = mFilterCenter + mFilter->size() - 1;
129  long int bptr = (filter_bottom - mBufferBase - 1 + mOutputRate) / mOutputRate;
130  long int fptr = mOutputRate * bptr + mBufferBase;
131 
132  // For normalization only
133  int offset = fptr - filter_bottom;
134 
135  for (long int j = 0; j<int(mChannels); j++) {
136  output(j, i) = (*mBuffer[bptr])(j)*(*mFilter)(abs(mFilterCenter - fptr));
137  }
138  bptr++;
139  fptr += mOutputRate;
140  while (fptr <= filter_top) {
141  for (long int j = 0; j<int(mChannels); j++) {
142  output(j, i) += (*mBuffer[bptr])(j)*(*mFilter)(abs(mFilterCenter - fptr));
143  }
144  bptr++;
145  fptr += mOutputRate;
146  }
147 
148  // Normalization
149  for (long int j = 0; j<int(mChannels); j++) {
150  output(j, i) *= mNormalization(offset);
151  }
152 
153  mFilterCenter += mInputRate;
154  }
155 
156  long int filter_bottom = mFilterCenter - mFilter->size() + 1;
157  long int bptr = (filter_bottom - mBufferBase - 1 + mOutputRate) / mOutputRate;
158  if (bptr > 0) {
159  del_front_point(bptr);
160  }
161  long int delta = mBufferBase - (mBufferBase % (mInputRate * mOutputRate));
162  mBufferBase -= delta;
163  mFilterCenter -= delta;
164 
165  return mOutData;
166  ;
167  }
168 
169  void BLInterpolation::SetData(Dmatrix& input, double scale) {
170  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "SetData");
171  if (input.size1() != mChannels) {
172  LogSevere("Bad number of channels");
173  throw bad_matrix_size("BLInterpolation::SetData");
174  }
175  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < input.size2(); i++) {
176 
177  add_back_point();
178 
179  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mChannels; j++) {
180  (*mBuffer.back())(j) = scale * input(j, i);
181  }
182 
183  }
184  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "New buffer size is %d", mBuffer.size());
185  }
186 
187  void BLInterpolation::Init() {
188  unsigned int gcd = MathUtils::gcd(mInputRate, mOutputRate);
189  mInputRate /= gcd;
190  mOutputRate /= gcd;
191  LogInfo("Reduced rates: Input = %d Output = %d", mInputRate, mOutputRate);
192  mRho = double(mOutputRate) / double(mInputRate);
193  mRho = (mRho < 1.0) ? mRho : 1.0;
194  unsigned int maxrate = (mInputRate > mOutputRate) ? mInputRate : mOutputRate;
195  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "Prepare the lookup table. length = %d rho = %f", mOrder * maxrate + 1, mRho);
196  if (mFilter == 0) {
197  delete mFilter;
198  }
199  mFilter = new Dvector(mOrder * maxrate + 1);
200  if (mFilter == 0) {
201  LogSevere("Memory allocation error");
202  throw std::runtime_error("Memory allocation error");
203  }
204 
205  for (unsigned i = 0; i < mFilter->size(); i++) {
206  (*mFilter)(i) = mRho * gsl_sf_sinc(double(i) / maxrate) * Kaiser(double(i) / (mFilter->size() - 1));
207  }
208 
209  switch (mNormalizationType) {
210  case DCNormalization:
211  DCRenormalization();
212  break;
213  case NONormalization:
214  default:
215  NORenormalization();
216  break;
217  }
218 
219  mBufferBase = 0;
220  mFilterCenter = (1 + (mOrder * maxrate) / mOutputRate) * mOutputRate;
221 
222  for (int i = 0; i < mFilterCenter; i += mOutputRate) {
223  add_back_point();
224  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mChannels; j++) {
225  (*mBuffer.back())(j) = 0.0;
226  }
227 
228  }
229 
230  mFirstData = true;
231 
232  LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2, "End Init()");
233  }
234 
235  double BLInterpolation::Kaiser(double w) {
236  double q = M_PI*mAlpha;
237  return gsl_sf_bessel_I0(q * sqrt(1.0 - w * w)) / gsl_sf_bessel_I0(q);
238  }
239 
240  void BLInterpolation::add_back_point() {
241  if (mRepository.empty()) {
242  mBuffer.push_back(new Dvector(mChannels));
243  } else {
244  mBuffer.push_back(mRepository.front());
245  mRepository.pop();
246  }
247  }
248 
249  void BLInterpolation::del_front_point(unsigned int n) {
250  while ((n > 0) && (mBuffer.size() > 0)) {
251  mRepository.push(mBuffer.front());
252  //Dvector* tmp=mBuffer.front();
253  mBuffer.pop_front();
254  //delete tmp;
255  mBufferBase += mOutputRate;
256  n--;
257  }
258  }
259 
260  long int BLInterpolation::resampled_available() {
261  long int filter_top = mFilterCenter + mFilter->size();
262  long int buffer_top = mBufferBase + mOutputRate * mBuffer.size();
263  long int avail = (buffer_top - filter_top) / mInputRate;
264  return (avail > 0) ? avail : 0;
265  }
266 
267  void BLInterpolation::NORenormalization() {
268  mNormalization.resize(mInputRate);
269 
270  for (int offset = 0; offset<int(mInputRate); offset++) {
271  mNormalization(offset) = 1.0;
272  }
273 
274  }
275 
276  void BLInterpolation::DCRenormalization() {
277  mNormalization.resize(mInputRate);
278 
279  for (int offset = 0; offset<int(mInputRate); offset++) {
280  mNormalization(offset) = 0.0;
281  for (int k = -int(mFilter->size() - 1) + offset; k<int(mFilter->size()); k += mOutputRate) {
282  mNormalization(offset) += (*mFilter)(abs(k));
283  }
284  mNormalization(offset) = 1.0 / mNormalization(offset);
285  //LogDebug(LOG_DEBUG_LEVEL_2,"Offset: %d Norm: %g",offset,mNormalization(offset));
286  }
287 
288  }
289

291 }
